portfolio.title: Sorry!
portfolio.description: Virtual recreation of the Sorry! board game. This project utilizes the Pygame module in Python.

portfolio.title: Doggy Playdate
portfolio.description: Prototype of an app to connect dog owners. This project was written in Swift and used Firebase.

portfolio.title: Compiler Project
portfolio.description: Writing a compiler to translate .rfun code into x86 assembly. This project was written in Python.

portfolio.title: Simplified Query
portfolio.description: Writing a customized query language. This project used Python and MySql.
